mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachment( attachment_no, attachment_origin_name, attachment_stored_name, attachment_size, mime_no ) VALUES (#{attachment_no}, #{attachment_origin_name}, #{attachment_stored_name}, #{attachment_size}, #{mime_no})
mapper.select: select a.attachment_no as 'attachment_no', attachment_origin_name, attachment_stored_name, attachment_size, mime_no from attachment a, qna_attachment q where q.qna_no = #{qna_no} and q.attachment_no = a.attachment_no order by q.attachment_no

select a.attachment_no as 'attachment_no', attachment_origin_name, attachment_stored_name, attachment_size, mime_no from attachment a, qna_answer_attachment q where q.qna_answer_no = #{qna_answer_no} and q.attachment_no = a.attachment_no order by q.attachment_no
